      Parameters:
      player - Player asking
      positionToCheck - Position of the move being checked
      Returns:

    • noMovesAvailable

      public boolean noMovesAvailable(Player player)
      Are there any available for this player?
      Parameters:
      player - Player asking
      Returns:
      True if moves are available

    • step

      protected boolean step(Player player, Position position, Position direction, int count)
      Traverses the board in the provided direction. Checks the status of each space: a. If it's the opposing player then we'll move to the next space to see if there's a blank space b. If it's the same player then this direction doesn't represent a legal move c. If it's a blank AND if it's not the adjacent square then this direction is a legal move. Otherwise, it's not.
      Parameters:
      player - Player making the request
      position - Position being checked
      direction - Direction to move
      count - Number of steps we've made so far
      Returns:
      True if we find a legal move

    • makeMove

      public void makeMove(Player playerToMove, Position positionToMove)
      Make the move. Scan all directions and switch the piece colors of the ones as appropriate
      Parameters:
      playerToMove - Player asking
      positionToMove - Position of the new move
